name: tampermonkey-llm-assistant
description: Enhance browsing and writing with automatic text rewriting using LLMs via Ollama
author: tootallderr

prompt_templates.grammar:
Fix grammar, spelling, and punctuation in the following text. Retain the original meaning and voice. Only return the corrected text:

{text}
prompt_templates.dont_lie:
Remove exaggerations, hyperbole, and speculation from the following statement. Make it more factual and accurate. Only return the revised text:

{text}
prompt_templates.facts_only:
Convert the following statement into an objective, factual tone. Remove opinions and emotional language. Only return the factual version:

{text}
prompt_templates.persona:
Rewrite the following text in the voice and style of {persona}. Match their tone and speaking patterns while keeping the same meaning and approximate length. Only return the rewritten text:

{text}

rewrite_modes.name: Grammar & Spelling
rewrite_modes.description: Fix grammar, spelling, and punctuation while preserving meaning

rewrite_modes.name: Persona Imitation
rewrite_modes.description: Rewrite in the style of selected personality
